Ross challenged the SNP over the issue following evidence to the UK Covid-19 Inquiry from some of the key figures during the pandemic.

title: Now cash-strapped NHS hires 50 diversity chiefs - at a cost of £2.3million
description: Scotland's crisis-hit NHS has been accused of wasting millions on an army of ‘diversity’ experts.
